import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import Img1 from "../../images/ouerEvents1.jpg"; import Img2 from "../../images/ouerEvents2.jpg"; import "./aboutus.css"; import { BiTimeFive } from "react-icons/bi"; import { ImLocation } from "react-icons/im"; const Membership = ({ users }) => { console.log("user", users); return (

Our Members

আমাদের সদস্য গণ

{users?.map((user, index) => (
{user?.displayName}
{user?.role} {user?.location}

1.2k Followers

14 Components

{/* */}
))}
); }; export default Membership;
